about_the_game:
Embark on "Watermelon Challenge," a game where strategic timing and precise fruit placement are key, and your objective is to combine fruits all the way up to the coveted watermelon. With a lively soundtrack to underscore your moves, this game transforms a simple premise into a complex, satisfying puzzle.

Guide your endearing yellow duck with a fishing pole to merge an array of fruits, starting from tiny cherries to the prized watermelons. Each merge increases both the size of the fruits and the challenge. Keep your bag from overflowing to avoid the game ending prematurely. As you climb the tiers of fruit, each successful combination not only brings a burst of joy but also draws you ever closer to the ultimate goal: a splendid watermelon.




- Fruit Fusion Fun: Navigate the nuances of fruit merging and enjoy the journey from cherry-sized beginnings to watermelon triumphs.

- Upbeat Soundtrack: Tap into the energy of the game with a soundtrack that's as compelling as the gameplay.

- Dynamic Duo: Bask in the game's radiant visuals with your dependable duck ally at your side, supporting you in each strategic merge.




- Competitive Leaderboards: Vie for the top spot on the Steam leaderboards, showcasing your skill as a master fruit merger.

- PvP Challenge: Engage in fruit-merging battles against other players. Out-merge your opponent within the time limit to push their playing field to the brink and secure your victory.



Step into the vibrant world of "Watermelon Challenge," where every successful merge celebrates the sweetness of strategy and the thrill of competition.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible sound card

name: Watermelon Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core, AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Face off in 'Watermelon Challenge,' the engaging puzzle game where players merge fruits to the rhythm of victory. Duel head-to-head, ascend the leaderboards, navigate a world filled with vibrant strategy, all while your dependable duck ally cheers you on to a peppy soundtrack!
